# Collection Management System Replacement Project

## Key Details

- **Tender Reference**: MX-42853223651

- **Expected Contract Start Date**: 2023-12-01
- **Expected Contract End Date**: 2023-12-01

## Procurement Details

- **Procurement Category**: IT
- **Procurement Method**: Competitive - Open Bidding
- **Trade Agreements**: NAFTA, CETA, CFTA
- **Regions of Opportunity**: n/a

## Soliciting Entity

- **Contracting Entity**: National Gallery of Canada / Musée des beaux-arts du Canada
- **Address**: 380 Sussex Drive, Ottawa, ON, K1N 9N4, Canada

## Bid Submissions

- **Use of Electronic Bidding Only**: The National Gallery of Canada is accepting electronic bids via the Bonfire website only. No hard copies will be accepted.
- **Official Source of Information**: All bid documents are available on the Bonfire website (ngc-mbac.bonfirehub.ca).
- **Fees**: Fees may apply when submitting bids through the Bonfire website. Please refer to the Bonfire pricing information.

## Contact Information

- **Contact Name**: Max Joly
- **Email**: [majoly@gallery.ca](mailto:majoly@gallery.ca)
- **Phone**: 613-714-6000 x6194
